timeline.message:
Removed VSRegistry.registerAny()

All ValuesSourceTypes must be registered
explicitly

timeline.bodyText: I think ALL might be a bit confusing here. I wonder if renaming it into ALL_CORE or using Arrays.asList(CoreValuesSourceType.values()) instead of the constant will better demonstrate the actual scope here for future readers.
timeline.author: imotov

replies.bodyText: To me it seemed clear that CoreValuesSourceType.ALL is about all core VST. I renamed it to CoreValuesSourceType.ALL_CORE hoping that this can't be misunderstood.
replies.author: csoulios

timeline.bodyText: This doesn't need to be a List now.  We can just make it Map<String, Map<ValuesSourceType, AggregatorSupplier>>.  The list was only necessary because lambdas make bad hash keys.
timeline.author: not-napoleon

replies.bodyText: Can I do it later in a separate PR? This will really mess me up if it is done in this PR.
replies.author: imotov

replies.bodyText: No problem @imotov if you are both ok with this, I will merge this PR and you can change this List to Map later.
replies.author: csoulios
